meanings.definition: Lacking style or neatness in appearance
meanings.sent1: She wore the dowdiest dress to the party, looking very plain.
meanings.sent2: The old scarecrow in the field was the dowdiest one, with tattered clothes.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat thought the dowdiest hat was too boring to play with.
meanings.sent4: The dowdiest flower in the garden stood out like a wilted shadow.
meanings.sent5: The dowdiest room in the house had peeling wallpaper and dusty shelves.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of fashionable style or elegance
meanings.sent1: Her dowdiest outfit consisted of mismatched socks and a wrinkled shirt.
meanings.sent2: Among the fashion models, her dowdiest attire was a clear contrast.
meanings.sent3: The dowdiest catwalk ever seen featured models in oversized sweaters.
meanings.sent4: The dowdiest painting in the gallery seemed to mock the concept of art.
meanings.sent5: The dowdiest event of the year was a fashion show with outdated trends.
